subject: World Cup (Soccer)
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Let’s not pretend this is going to be like any World Cup ever before. The stakes are raised tenfold. This may be the 19th soccer World Cup in 80 years, but it’s the first to be held in Africa.
snippet: Let’s not pretend this is going to be like any World Cup ever before. The stakes are raised tenfold. This may be the 19th soccer World Cup in 80 years, but it’s the first to be held in Africa.
